overview: Sadistic boyfriend makes his girlfriend seduce her step-mom under threat of eviction from the house. But they'll find out soon enough that Bradley wants to do a lot more than just watch, and Bradley ALWAYS gets what he wants  Trent wants to have a daughter and after losing his wife and another woman who gave him two other sons, he asked April to be the vessel for his daughter in exchange for a lot of money that will help her to go college.
title: Why Are You Doing This!?
